attributes.action: Make parking in cycle lanes the same as parking on double yellow lines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cycle lanes don't seem to be treated the same as other traffic lanes.  This is wrong.  Most motorists would never dream of leaving their car parked in the middle of the carrige way, so why is parking in a cycle lane any different?  Parking in cycle lanes should be treated the same as parking on double yellow lines -a parking ticket worthy offence.
